snippet: Another person has died from meningitis, bringing the death toll in an unprecedented outbreak to 15, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Another person has died from meningitis, bringing the death toll in an unprecedented outbreak to 15, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Saturday.

headline.seo: In Meningitis Outbreak, Another Death Reported
headline.main: Another Death Reported in Meningitis Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Another Death Reported in Meningitis Outbreak

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
